channel.title: How do i back up my files?
channel.description:
Hey guys, as we all know there is a 'Restore previous version' selection on a drop down list when you right-click an item (like this):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bandicam2011-06-1320-04-05-328.jpg[/img]
Now, when you click it, it allows you to select a date to restore the file to.
How do i manually Back-up my file so if i need to, i can select the date from which i last backed it up from?

item.title: How do i back up my files?
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

[quote=“pokemonn, post:2, topic:399232”]right click on your desktop and then go down to new then folder and name it back up
then go to your server or client (which ever your backing up) and hold down the left mouse button and select everything inside and then when everything is selected rightclick on one of the files and click copy then go to your back-up folder and right click then paste and there you go lol

would be better then restore thing[/quote]
this

Read full topic
item.source: How do i back up my files?

item.title: How do i back up my files?
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

Without making a new folder simply copy your folder already made and paste it.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i back up my files?
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

right click on your desktop and then go down to new then folder and name it back up
then go to your server or client (which ever your backing up) and hold down the left mouse button and select everything inside and then when everything is selected rightclick on one of the files and click copy then go to your back-up folder and right click then paste and there you go lol

would be better then restore thing
